title: Mathematical problem-solving project-based learning utilizing online incremental peer assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (functions, equations, statistics) and digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Conducting projects applying mathematics to real-life problem-solving for general citizens

learning_goals: Learners improve creative problem-solving skills by completing three or more math-based projects within six months.
Project deliverables are improved two or more times by incorporating peer evaluation feedback at over 80% implementation.
Mathematical communication skills are strengthened through interaction with peer learners via online platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
